name: Mercforce: 30X1
description: Save humanity! Get paid! The year is thirty-something-and-one; big money and bigger gunned PMC Mercforce is the only thing standing between the AI menace and mankind’s certain doom! Take the fight back to the drones across a series of exhilarating and explosive missions where the focus is acrobatic and thrilling gameplay, instead of complicated controls and mechanics. Fly alone or with your mates in a variety of combat spacecraft with an even bigger variety of exciting weapons! Mercforce: 30X1 is your new go-to for a quick rough and tumble in space!
